version_description:
• Native iPad support!
• Removed 100 sub-element limit from full version
• Image elements can have child elements
• Other changes:
- Image element contents can be changed
- Icons use higher resolution
- Added timestamp to PDF output
- Supports iOS 7.1 (and still iOS 7.0)

• Native iPad support!
• Removed 100 sub-element limit from full version
• Image elements can have child elements
• Other changes:
- Image element contents can be changed
- Icons use higher resolution
- Added timestamp to PDF output
- Supports iOS 7.1 (and still iOS 7.0)

• Native iPad support!
• Removed 100 sub-element limit from full version
• Image elements can have child elements

- Image element contents can be changed
- Icons use higher resolution
- Added timestamp to PDF output
- Supports iOS 7.1 (and still iOS 7.0)

• Bug fixes
• Improved In-App purchase (info, price)

• Support for links between elements

• Bug fixing (iOS8):
- Rotation issues 
- Crash on copy / paste

Maintenance update. Fixed an issue with iOS 8 devices.

Added possibility to import content from various sources.
Fixed iOS 10 related visual issues.
Maintenance release (minor updates).

• Added support for adding high quality images as attachments
• Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Small fixes and improvements
- Support for iPhone X
In this version we still use light mode before our Dark Mode support gets ready for prime time.
Added in-app helpdesk with answers for frequently asked questions.
Fixed a layout issue when viewing or exporting as mind map.
Optimizations for iOS 12, minor updates
- Fixed issue with keyboard appearance
Optimizations for iOS 12, minor updates
Fixed a layout issue when viewing or exporting as mind map.
Added in-app helpdesk with answers for frequently asked questions.
Added support for iOS 13.
In this version we still use light mode before our Dark Mode support gets ready for prime time.

- Fixed an issue with font colors.
- Possibility to use compact layout on iPhone. 
- Minor improvements and bug fixes.
